summary: This is a forwarded email from an FBI Senior Forensic Examiner (NYO CART Coordinator) to an unspecified recipient, providing a status update on the processing of digital evidence seized from Jeffrey Epstein's properties. It details the number of items processed, ongoing work on servers and DVRs, and exports provided to the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The digital evidence being processed is from his properties (NY apartment and Island).

events.title: Epstein Digital Evidence Status Update
events.description: An FBI Senior Forensic Examiner provides a status update on processing digital evidence seized from Epstein's NY apartment and private island, noting 55 items accounted for, ongoing work on 2 servers and 3 DVRs, and exports of files to the Southern District of New York.

locations: The Island (Epstein's private island, likely Little St. James)
keyFacts: 55 items of digital evidence from Epstein's properties were accounted for.
2 servers from the Island and 3 DVRs (1 from NY, 2 from Island) were still being processed due to mechanical difficulties and were being examined for deleted files.
Files from 39 items had been exported to the Southern District of New York for review, limited to documents, spreadsheets, emails, and presentations, excluding images and videos.
